segments.text: Good morning . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I would like to make a reservation to Hong Kong for August 2 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a moment , please . I am sorry , sir . There is no ticket available on that day . But we have flights for Hong Kong the next day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I inquire about the departure time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A 9:12 flight in the morning and a 14:00 flight in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When will the plane reach Hong Kong for the morning flight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I would like to book a ticket for that one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , sir . Please reconfirm your ticket no later than 12 noon two days before the flight ; otherwise , your reservation will automatically be canceled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . What's the fare ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 500 dollars , not including ground transportation fares between the airport and downtown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Will it be doubled for the round trip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , sir . And please do not forget to bring a valid travel document with you when you buy the tickets .
segments.speaker: S1
